mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BoardNews_tbl SELECT IFNULL(max(boardNews_id)+1,100001), #{bnGroup}, #{bnHighLight}, #{bnTitle}, #{bnSubTitle}, #{bnKeyword}, #{bnTitleImageLink}, #{bnRelatedLink}, #{bnContent}, #{bnViewCount}, #{bnOrder}, #{bnStatus}, #{staff_id}, NOW(), NOW(), null FROM BoardNews_tbl
mapper.update: update BoardNews_tbl set bnViewCount = iFnull(bnViewCount, 0) +1 where boardNews_id = #{boardNews_id}

update BoardNews_tbl set bnGroup= #{bnGroup}, bnHighLight= #{bnHighLight}, bnTitle= #{bnTitle}, bnSubTitle= #{bnSubTitle}, bnKeyword= #{bnKeyword}, bnTitleImageLink= #{bnTitleImageLink}, bnRelatedLink= #{bnRelatedLink}, bnContent= #{bnContent}, bnUpdateDt= NOW() where boardNews_id = #{boardNews_id}
UPDATE BoardNews_tbl SET bnStatus='1' WHERE boardNews_id = #{boardNews_id};
UPDATE BoardNews_tbl SET bnStatus='2' WHERE boardNews_id = #{boardNews_id};
mapper.select: select count(*) from BoardNews_tbl WHERE bnDeleteDt IS NULL
SELECT boardNews_id, bnTitle, date_format(bnUpdateDt,'%Y%m%d') as bnUpdateDt FROM BoardNews_tbl WHERE bnDeleteDt IS NULL ORDER BY bnUpdateDt DESC Limit 5

select c.* from (select @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS ROWNUM, a.* from (select * from BoardNews_tbl where bnDeleteDt IS NULL order by bnInsertDt desc) a, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) R ) c where c.ROWNUM >= #{startRow} and c.ROWNUM <= #{endRow}
mapper.update: update BoardNews_tbl set bnDeleteDt = NOW() where boardNews_id = #{boardNews_id}
